text:
SPEAKERS AT TIIE TENTH ANNUAL BARNARD FORUM — 3
Also, Mary Baldwin College, Mary Washington College, Mills College (California),
Mount Holyoke College, Pembroke College, Radcliffe College, Randolph-Macon Woman's
College, Russell Sage College, St. John's University, St. Joseph's College for
Women, Sarah Lawrence College, Scripps College, Simmons College, Skidmore College,
Smith College, Swarthmore College, Sweet Briar College, Texas State College for
Women, Trinity College (Washington, D.C.), Vassar College, Wellesley College, Wells
College, Wheaton College, William Smith College, Wilson College, Winthrop College,
and the New York City Branch of the American Association of University Womeii.
The Forum will begin with a luncheon at 12:45 p.m. in the Grand Ballroom* The
program will start at 2:00 p.m. Tickets for the luncheon and the program are $6.00;
for the program only, $2»00. Reservations may be obtained by writing to the Barnard
Forum, 606 West 120 Street, New York 27, or by calling MOnument 2-8992,
